DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter , Prospective Cohort Study Provide Real-world Evidence Effect Nab-paclitaxel Treatment Clinical Outcomes Health-related Quality Life Patients With MBC Greece
DOC.criteria: Patients eligible inclusion study meet follow criterion : Adult patient ( 18 year old ) ; Patients histologically cytologically confirm diagnosis MBC fail firstline treatment metastatic disease standard , anthracycline contain therapy indicate ; Patients decision prescribe therapy nabpaclitaxel accord locally approve product 's summary product characteristic ( SmPC ) already take prior enrolment study ; assignment patient therapeutic strategy decide advance study protocol fall within current practice prescription nabpaclitaxel clearly separate physician 's decision include patient current study ; Patients must able willing provide write informed consent comply requirement study protocol ; Patients must sign informed consent document ; Patients must able read , understand complete study specific questionnaire A patient meet follow criterion exclude participation study : Patients initiated treatment nabpaclitaxel 7 day prior enrolment study ; Patients meet contraindication administration study drug accord approve SmPC ; Receipt investigational agent within 30 day 5 halflives investigational agent ( whichever longer ) commencement therapy nabpaclitaxel .
